text:
@SenSchumer So now even the coronavirus is racist?  What's next? 
Sorry Schumer yall need to stop acting like black people can't get anywhere without handouts or even think for themselves. They sat in same classrooms as I and many pretty smart. Stop using them to push yalls agenda.
